entry.data:
CLOUDY
NUMEROUS SHOWERS THIS MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF FLURRIES AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

SNOW LIKELY
RAIN LIKELY
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN AND SNOW LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
LOWS AROUND 20
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT
